facts.text: My beautiful spines are actually venomous! They can give a very painful sting to anything that touches them.
I'm an invader! I'm not supposed to live in the Atlantic Ocean, but people released me and now I'm causing problems.
I can eat fish more than half my own size! My stretchy stomach lets me swallow really big meals.
I have no natural predators in the Atlantic! That's why scientists are teaching sharks and groupers to eat us.
A single female like me can release 2 million eggs per year! That's why there are so many of us now.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs (native to Indo-Pacific, invasive in Atlantic)
